content.en: Energy-efficient image compression: Researchers are using algorithms to address the question of how to reduce energy consumption in image compression for wireless sensor networks. These algorithms propose low-complexity and energy efficient image compression schemes, distribute the workload of image compression tasks, optimize network lifetime, and evaluate the performance and energy consumption of different image compression algorithms. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to develop fast, low complexity, and energy efficient image compression methods that can enhance image transmission and reduce energy consumption in wireless sensor networks.
content.da: Energieffektiv billedkomprimering: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at tackle spørgsmålet om, hvordan man reducerer energiforbruget ved billedkomprimering for trådløse sensornetværk. Disse algoritmer foreslår lav-kompleksitets og energieffektive billedkomprimeringsskemaer, fordeler arbejdsbyrden ved billedkomprimeringsopgaver, optimerer netværkets levetid og evaluerer ydeevnen og energiforbruget af forskellige billedkomprimeringsalgoritmer. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskere mod at udvikle hurtige, lav-kompleksitets og energieffektive billedkomprimeringsmetoder, der kan forbedre billedtransmissionen og reducere energiforbruget i trådløse sensornetværk.
